Name: alcoholic hepatitis
Definition: An osteochondrodysplasia that has_material_basis_in a deficiency in type-I collagen which results_in brittle bones and defective connective tissue.

Name: viral hepatitis
Definition: A hepatitis that involves viral infection causing inflammation of the liver.

Name: obsolete Flaviviridae infectious disease
Definition: A (+)ssRNA virus infectious disease that results_in infection in animals and humans

Name: drug-induced hepatitis
Definition: A viral infectious disease that results_in inflammation located_in liver

Name: granulomatous hepatitis
Definition: An autosomal recessive disease that is characterized by bleeding symptoms due to low levels of circulating prothrombin
